title: Dean Baquet on Diversity, Local News, and Calling Trump a Liar
description: New York Times Executive Editor Dean Baquet joins Chuck Todd to talk about how difficult it can be covering politicians like Donald Trump, and why the biggest threat facing journalism is on the local level.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
